1449050.name: Mater Abyss
1449050.description:
A mother and her child have disappeared without a trace.

As Agata, assigned to document the case, you enter the apartment where they were last seen. Your task is simple: observe, record, and gather every detail.

But the longer you stay, the more the house begins to change.

Mater Abyss is a first-person psychological horror experience with a found footage aesthetic, built on atmosphere, tension, and observation.
Your camera’s zoom is not just a tool to look closer… it may reveal what should not be seen.

Explore shifting environments, document clues, and confront a presence that may never fully reveal itself.

Some things do not want to be found.
1449050.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
